Name: Heroine of the Sniper
About the game: ''You must be here about the new operator position. Unfortunately no more are--- Wait, you wanna be a sniper!?'' This is a light-hearted first person shooter. Key Features: Consists of 15 missions with a variety of themes. Take out various targets, everything from trains, cars, to bombs and helicopters. Everything EXCEPT people! Utilize the unique skill/perks system to go all out and customize your character. No need to hesitate with complicated weapon management. Just shoot. The main character comes to life in 2D animation. 2 difficulty levels and plenty of unlockable achievements.
